title: Apple Faces Margin Pressure as Memory Chip Prices Surge Amid AI Boom
description: Apple is beginning to feel the strain from rapidly rising memory chip prices, a challenge that is expected to intensify in the current quarter as the global semiconductor market pivots toward artificial intelligence...
